commands.rpgkit.unknown_spell_element: Unknown element (no such aspect or item)
rpgkit.magic.must_have_mana: You need magic energy to cast spells
rpgkit.magic.must_have_empty_hand: You need an empty hand to cast spells
rpgkit.magic.help.use_cast: Use the item (right mouse click) to cast the spell normally.
rpgkit.magic.help.area_cast: Press %s to cast the spell on area around you.
rpgkit.magic.help.self_cast: Press %s to apply the spell to yourself.
rpgkit.magic.help.catalyst_bag: If you have a catalyst bag, press %s to open it (you must have it in your hotbar)
